channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Revised BEPS Action 5 Transparency Framework on Tax Rulings
item.description: Revised BEPS Action 5 Transparency Framework on Tax Rulings by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Thursday 4 September 2025 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: Education at a Glance 2025 - OECD Indicators
item.description: Education at a Glance 2025 - OECD Indicators by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Tuesday 9 September 2025 at 9:00.

item.title: Education at a Glance 2025 Sources, Methodologies and Technical Notes
item.description: Education at a Glance 2025 Sources, Methodologies and Technical Notes by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Tuesday 9 September 2025 at 9:00.

item.title: Tax Policy Reforms 2025 - OECD and Selected Partner Economies
item.description: Tax Policy Reforms 2025 - OECD and Selected Partner Economies by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Thursday 11 September 2025 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: Regional Integration in the Union for the Mediterranean 2025 - Progress Report
item.description: Regional Integration in the Union for the Mediterranean 2025 - Progress Report by Global Relations and Cooperation Directorate has an embargo on Friday 12 September 2025 at 10:00.

item.title: The Global Forum on Productivity at 10 - Past and Future Perspectives on Reviving Productivity Growth
item.description: The Global Forum on Productivity at 10 - Past and Future Perspectives on Reviving Productivity Growth by Economics Department has an embargo on Monday 15 September 2025 at 13:45.

item.title: Governing with Artificial Intelligence - The State of Play and Way Forward in Core Government Functions
item.description: Governing with Artificial Intelligence - The State of Play and Way Forward in Core Government Functions by Directorate for Public Governance has an embargo on Thursday 18 September 2025 at 9:00.

item.title: To Have and Have Not – How to Bridge the Gap in Opportunities
item.description: To Have and Have Not – How to Bridge the Gap in Opportunities by Centre for Well-Being, Inclusion, Sustainability and Equal Opportunity has an embargo on Monday 22 September 2025 at 9:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Well-Being, Inclusion, Sustainability and Equal Opportunity

item.title: The Green Transition of SMEs and Entrepreneurship in Portugal
item.description: The Green Transition of SMEs and Entrepreneurship in Portugal by Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs, Regions and Cities has an embargo on Tuesday 23 September 2025 at 10:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs, Regions and Cities

item.title: Assessing Bosnia and Herzegovina's Reform Agenda for Private Sector Development
item.description: Assessing Bosnia and Herzegovina's Reform Agenda for Private Sector Development by Global Relations and Cooperation Directorate has an embargo on Friday 26 September 2025 at 0:00.

item.title: Measuring Science and Innovation for Sustainable Growth
item.description: Measuring Science and Innovation for Sustainable Growth by Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry has an embargo on Thursday 9 October 2025 at 12:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry
